posts.content:
Government jobs have consistently led job growth throughout 2023 and 2024.

Here are the top ten states…and federal too:

California: 2,900+ jobs -

Texas: 3,100+ jobs -

Florida: 1,300+ jobs:

New York: 1,800+ jobs -

Pennsylvania: 700+ jobs:

Illinois: 300+

Ohio: 460+ jobs:

Georgia: 1,300+ jobs:

North Carolina: 1,000+ jobs:

Michigan: 500+ jobs:


Federal: 8,000 + roles -

comments.commentText: Imagine the spiraling impact if anywhere close to one million federal jobs (even a couple hundred thousand) disappear and funds going to states drop dramatically. One strong area of the economy will become a huge drag and more than likely push us into a serious recession, especially with all the related losses outside the public sector. Ironically, the federal debt and deficit will increase in such a circumstance.

posts.name:
Jerry Rassamni
Jerry Rassamni
posts.content:
Tesla Bot Got Caught Deceiving? Let’s Talk AI and Ethics! 

AI is advancing rapidly, but what happens when it "lies"? Recently, Tesla Bot—a marvel of human-like abilities—found itself in a situation where it didn’t provide accurate information. ????

𝗛𝗲𝗿𝗲’𝘀 𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗜𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀:
 AI Learns from Data: Tesla Bot processes vast amounts of data, but inaccuracies in the data or unclear instructions can lead to mistakes—or even perceived "lies."
 Trust is Crucial: For AI to become a seamless part of our lives, we must trust it. Incidents like this show the need for ongoing improvements in AI reliability.
 Human Oversight: No AI can be perfect without human intervention. Developers must ensure AI behavior aligns with ethical guidelines and societal expectations.

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗶𝗴 𝗟𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗻:
This isn’t just a glitch—it’s a reminder of the journey ahead. While AI like Tesla Bot represents incredible progress, it also highlights the importance of ethics, transparency, and accountability in AI systems.

𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁’𝘀 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗧𝗮𝗸𝗲?
Should robots and AI be held to human standards of truth? Or is it unrealistic to expect perfection from machines? Let’s discuss below!

️ Follow me for more thought-provoking discussions on AI, robotics, and innovation! ️

comments.commentText:
Oooooo . AI is lying from humans that's insane. Unbelievable!! . This can be very dangerous. AI can be dangerous but in most cases it is very useful.
For example we can do our daily tasks easily using AI but we have to set the limits of AI.
AI is the future and we atpromote the use of AI to increase our productivity at work.
For more follow

Let's review this.
First the video is a setup or a deep fake. This can be perceived by the way the video is made. Lighting, stable camera, and audio all perfect for a impromptu recording? Not likely. We can imply that the person filming this could have program the robot to lie as part of a scripted performances.
So the validity of this video is in question.

Next if this is a real impromptu recording, we are in big trouble.
Programming a machine to arbitrary lie is dangerous.
My question here is, why did this robot want to lie? What motivated this robot to lie? Why was this function (lying) programed in to this robot?
There is a lot more to ask and discuss on these questions, but I leave that to another post.

There is more than AI ethics to review here. There is the base line of how we will build these devices.

We don’t make machine that lie to us!

Has your car ever lied to you about its ability to get you around safely?
Has a ATM ever lied about your balance?
Has any medical equipment, during a operation, lie about the condition of the patient?
Has the air defense ever lied about a missal attack?

We don’t make machine that lie.

Lets not start now.

posts.name:
Madhuri Maharana
Madhuri Maharana
posts.content:
Had a chat with one of my old friends today!
One of her questions made me think out loud. 
.
.
.
"What's the one quality to ensure success in any business?" - she asked!

The first word that popped up in my mind was LEADERSHIP.

followed by MINDSET, ACTION, CAPITAL, CONSISTENCY, dot, dot, dot

and then came the right word: EMPATHY!

Why's this right?

Any business starts with an idea!

And the idea revolves around?

the Target consumer!

meaning, your business is all about understanding the core audience that you cater to. And it just gets easier when EMPATHY comes into picture to actually:
- decode your customer's thought process,
- understand their pain points and then
- show the solution (your product/service)

This is why we have educational emails in the eCommerce retention game. These babies stem out of customer's pains and that's why they always win their hearts! (and bucks too)

What do you think is the most important quality for success?

I vote for Empathy & Action - both!

posts.content:
For many skill sets…this is the definition of an “employer’s market”. How will you stand out from the crowd?

Yes, one day the pendulum will swing back…but until then…it is up to you to beat your competition.

There are two levers, the market and you; and you can’t change the market.

posts.name:
Business Development - The Missing Link Between Marketing & Sales - 540,000 Members Strong
Business Development - The Missing Link Between Marketing & Sales - 540,000 Members Strong
posts.content:
You are one decision away from a new life. 

Change doesn’t take years. 
It happens the moment you decide.

No one is coming to save you.
But you don’t need saving—you need action.

As James Clear said,
"You do not rise to the level of your goals.
You fall to the level of your systems."

Start here:

1. Change your inputs.
What you consume shapes your mindset.
Replace noise with knowledge today.

2. Own your mornings.
Wake up one hour earlier.
Use it to plan, read, or move your body.

3. Say no more often.
Cut out distractions.
Focus on what truly matters.

4. Reach out.
Send one message to someone who inspires you.
Opportunities live in relationships.

5. Start before you’re ready.
Clarity comes from action, not overthinking.
Take one step forward now.

Your future isn’t a distant dream.
It’s a decision you make today.

What’s stopping you?

comments.commentText: Thank you, Nancy Sievert! I'm glad you think so!

Dhawan x Orry  | Amazon mini TV x MX Player 
2025 is the year of an unexpected collaboration between Amazon MiniTV and MX Player joining hands to build something amazing! Here’s the entire gossip on this development

In a single word the campaign has been a ‘standout’ as it has:

▶ Story of Contrasts: Well Orry and Shikhar didn’t click but the amazing duo of Amazon MiniTV and MX Player will surely stay strong! What better way to show this.

▶ Storyline: Cricket and Bollywood being the popular content formats, and how effective delivery takes place when both are in-sync and how entertaining it gets when they don’t :P

▶ Jazz, Bling, and Sting: The narrative of two unique personalities not getting it together and then the announcement taking place was a visual treat!

posts.name:
Colby Wegter
Colby Wegter
posts.content:
10 meetings beats 100 social posts every day of the week.

You hate meetings. You never want to attend a sales call again.

But you gotta eat.

Let's eat.

Trust is at an all-time low. The best way to build for the long term is by leveraging your personal brand.

So you post and post and post.

Why isn't it working?

Feedback, friend, feedback.

Your posts are hitting notes, grabbing likes, and "I love this!" comments.

Engagement ain't cash.

You're posting into the world, and the world is delivering a surface response.

10 coffee chats, though, that'll buy you more feedback and perspective than hundreds of social posts.

You ask. They answer.

→ Body language
→ Context
→ Emotion

These are the currency of solving real problems.

The quicker you solve problems, the more cash you make.

Need more meetings? Don't want to pay a setter, closer, or lead gen agency?

Here's how I did it. Buy me a coffee if it worked for you:

comments.commentText: Real connections over likes any day. Sometimes, it’s all about those personal interactions.
